title: Jessica Mauboy shows off her 1.5 carat diamond engagement ring
text:
Jessica Mauboy finally confirmed her engagement to long-term boyfriend Themeli Magripilis on Wednesday.

And now details about the 30-year-old singer's huge diamond engagement ring have been revealed.

The sparkler was designed by Mondial by Nadia Neuman and features an oval cut 1.5 carat diamond surrounded by marquise cut stones on the band.

He did good! Jessica Mauboy (right) flaunted her impressive 1.5 carat oval diamond ring after her long-term boyfriend Themeli Magripilis (left) proposed in Greece

The unique ring is set in a premium white gold and features a butterfly motif under the stone which the designer explained is symbolic to Jessica.

'We took a classic design and made it unique and special for Jess,' jewellery designer Nadia said.

'So, because we knew butterflies meant a lot to Jess, we wanted to incorporate them into her custom design,' she added.

Shine bright: The ring was designed by Mondial by Nadia Neuman and features an oval cut 1.5 carat diamond

'We made it unique and special for Jess': The sparkler also features a butterfly motif under the stone which the designer Nadia explained is symbolic to Jessica

Sparkle: The 1.5 carat diamond is surrounded by marquise cut stones and diamonds on the band

Nadia also revealed that she designed the ring with Themeli and Jessica's stylist and tried to create something that 'would be uniquely her'.

'Themeli knows her heart, what matters to her most and that she loves things that are pretty, feminine, delicate and classic,' she explained.

'Having her stylist be part of the process also helped as he knew what looked good on her, what would make her feel good to wear and what would be uniquely her,' she added.

One of a kind: Nadia (pictured left with Jessica) revealed that she designed the ring with Themeli and Jessica's stylist

Romantic: On Wednesday, Jessica (pictured) revealed she became engaged to her boyfriend Themeli during a recent holiday in Greece

Meanwhile, Jessica revealed that she's set to marry her boyfriend of over 10 years on Wednesday.

Taking to Instagram, she said that they had gotten engaged during a recent holiday in Greece, visiting Themeli's family.

'We are so happy. I can’t wait to spend the rest of my life with my best friend. Thank you for all the love. BIG LOVE JM & Themeli,' she wrote.
description: Jessica Mauboy finally confirmed her engagement to long-term boyfriend Themeli Magripilis on Wednesday.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
